pasugiyada kolambaa maha nagara sabhawa athulu palath palana aayathana 23 k sandaha mathiwaranaya pawathi dinaye mulleriyawa pradeshayedi janadhipathiwarayage wruththiya samithi katayuthu pilibanda hitapu adhyaksha janaral bharatha lakshman premachandra mahatha saha duminda silwa mahatha athara athiwu gatumakadi siduwu wedithabimakin premachandra mahatha jiwithakshayata path wu athara duminda silwa manthriwarayatada thuwala siduwiya. shri jayawardhanapura maha rohale dadi sathkara eekakaye prathikara labana duminda silwa mahathage suwaduk balima sandaha mita perathuwa aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha athulu pirisak da giya bawa madhya magin wartha kara thibini.
